api¶

screenshot¶

take some screenshot

Syntax:¶

#api screenshot [url]

weather¶

check the weather

Syntax:¶

#api weather [city name]

shorturl¶

generate a short link

Syntax:¶

#api shorturl [url]

release¶

check the CTF challenges released by ImaginaryCTF

Syntax:¶

#api release

random¶

gives the following things randomly:

  • Cat fact

  • Random user

  • your ip

  • quote

  • Dog picture

Syntax:¶

#api random

Discord Bot
